body_html: This sounds like a system configuration issue with either Python or CUDA, especially the bit where PyObject_Malloc crashes. Do you have multiple versions of Python installed on your machine? What information did you give to configure?
body_text: This sounds like a system configuration issue with either Python or CUDA, especially the bit where PyObject_Malloc crashes.  Do you have multiple versions of Python installed on your machine?  What information did you give to configure?
